name: Seppic - Microbiome-Friendly Ingredients Portfolio
description: Seppic is a major cosmetic ingredient supplier offering a broad portfolio of microbiome-friendly ingredients with strong regulatory approvals. Their comprehensive approach to microbiome science ensures compliant, effective ingredients for supporting skin microbiome health across multiple product categories.
notes: Seppic is a major Air Liquide subsidiary with strong regulatory expertise. Broad portfolio of microbiome-friendly ingredients ensures formulators can find complete solutions. Regulatory approval strength critical for global product launches.
